column2: An itinerant wanderer, the Grey Wizard Olorin is much admired in the Moot for his fireworks displays and even more so for his ability to pull rabbits out of a hat. Tasty rabbits, too. Olorin has a secret, but he's not telling.
Aragand the Layabout is the type of bloke you see sitting in the corner of every tavern in the Empire. Alone, scruffy and unloved. He claims to be a King in waiting of a far off land.
Aragand the Layabout is in fact the true ruler of a petty kingdom in the Borderlands! Overthrown and exiled by an ambitious and cruel family member, he has been wandering the world ever since.
Legles, out for his morning constitutional, was forcibly befriended by a hapless Dwarf, named Giblit. The two have formed an unlikely friendship.
Giblit is a failed Slayer. In absolute shame, his peers sent him out to befriend an Elf. This he did, much to the Elf's disgust.
